SA20n1370:19: punaḥ śikṣātrayadeśanā sūtreṇa adhiśīlādhicittasaṃpādanatā vinayena śīlavato 'vipratisārādavipratisāreṇa[dikrameṇa] samādhilābhāt |
SA20n1370:34: te ca sūtravinayabhidharmāḥ pratyekaṃ caturvidhārthāḥ samāsatasteṣāṃ jñānābdodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāṃ prāpnoti |
SA20n1370:40: tatrāśrayo yatra deśe deśitaṃ yena yasmai ca |
SA20n1370:47: abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmo'bhidharma ekaikasya dharmasya rūpyarūpisanidarśanādiprabhedena bahulanirdeśāt |
SA20n1370:61: prajñapte śikṣāpade punaḥ paryāyeṇa a[ṇānu] jñānāt,
SA20n1370:68: prajñaptito yadā'rocite pudgalāparādhe śāstā saṃnipātya saṃgha[saṃghaṃ ? ]
SA20n1370:70: pravibhāgato yaḥ prajñapte śikṣāpade taduddeśasya vibhāgaḥ |
SA20n1370:76: tatra grāhakabhūtaṃ kāyādikamādhyātmikaṃ grāhyabhūtaṃ bāhyaṃ tayoreva tathatā dvayam |
SA20n1370:91: yadi manojalpādevāyamarthaḥ khyātīti paśyati nānyanmanojalpādyathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe |
SA20n1370:92: cittasya nāmni sthānāt bhāvanāmayena jñānena tallābho veditavyo dvayānupalambhādyathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe |
SA20n1370:93: ata eva ca sa pūrvoktastrividhālambanalābho dharmālambanalābhasaṃniśrito veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1370:100: pañcadhā saptadha caiva parijñā pañcadhā 'sya ca ||10 ||
SA20n1370:104: yogināṃ hi manaskāra eṣa sarvātmako mataḥ ||12 ||
SA20n1370:106: dhātuniyataḥ kṛtyakara āśrayavibhakto 'dhimuktiniveśakaścchandajanakaḥ samādhisaṃniśrito jñānasaṃprayuktaḥ saṃbhinnālambano vibhinnālambanaḥ parijñāniyato bhāvanākārapraviṣṭaḥ śamathavipaśyanāmārgasvabhāvo 'nuśaṃsamanaskāraḥ pratīcchakaḥ prāyogikamanaskāro vaśavartimanaskāraḥ parīttamanaskāro vipulamanaskāraśca |
SA20n1370:118: vibhinnālambanaḥ saptavidho nāmālambanaḥ padālambano vyañjanālambanaḥ pudgalanairātmyālambano dharma nairātmyālambano rūpidharmālambano'rūpidharmālambanaśca |
SA20n1370:121: parijñāniyato yaḥ parijñeye vastuni parijñeye 'rthe parijñāyāṃ parijñāphale tatpravedanāyāṃ ca |
SA20n1370:130: pratilambhākārabhāvano nisevanākārabhāvano vinirdhāvanā [nirvirghāṭanā] kārabhāvanaḥ pratipakṣākārabhāvanaḥ samyakprahāṇeṣu |
SA20n1370:136: sthitacittasya lokottarasaṃpattisaṃpratyayākārabhāvano yathā saṃpratyayākārabhāvana evaṃ vyavasāyākārabhāvano dharmāsaṃpramoṣākārabhāvanaścittasthityākārabhāvanaḥ pravicayākārabhāvana indriyeṣu |
SA20n1370:139: prāptiniścayākārabhāvanaḥ parikarmabhūmisaṃrakṣaṇākārabhāvanaḥ parasaṃprāptyākārabhāvana āryakāntaśīlapraviṣṭākārabhāvanaḥ saṃlikhitavṛttisamudācāra[rā]kārabhāvanaḥ pūrvaparibhāvitapratilabdhamārgābhyāsākārabhāvano dharmasthitinimittāsaṃpramoṣākārabhāvano 'nimittasthityāśrayaparivṛttyākārabhāvanaśca mārgāṅgeṣu |
SA20n1370:145: vṛttyupalakṣaṇaprāyogiko yena dvividhāṃ vṛttimupalakṣayate parimāṇavṛttiṃ ca vyañjanānāmaparimāṇavṛttiṃ ca nāmapadayoḥ |
SA20n1370:167: jñeyaṃ heyamatho viśodhyamamalaṃ yacca prakṛtyā matam |
SA20n1370:173: tatra prathamaṃ tattvaṃ parijñeyaṃ dvitīyaṃ praheyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ viśodhyaṃ cāgantukamalādviśuddhaṃ ca prakṛtyā,
SA20n1370:175: na hyākāśādīni prakṛtyā aśuddhāni na cāgantukamalāpagamādeṣāṃ viśuddhirneṣyata iti |
SA20n1370:180: na khalu tasmādevaṃlakṣaṇāddharmadhātoḥ kiṃcidanyalloke vidyate dharmatāyā dharmasyābhinnatvāt |
SA20n1370:185: yathā māyā yantra [mantra]parigṛhītaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādikam tathābhūtaparikalpaḥ paratantraḥ svabhāvo [svabhāvākāro] veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1370:186: yathā māyākṛtaṃ tasyāṃ māyāyāṃ hastyaśvasuvarṇādyākṛtistadbhāvena pratibhāsitā,
SA20n1370:190: yathā[']tasminna tadbhāvo māyākṛte hastitvādyabhāvastathā tasminparatantre paramārtha iṣyate parikalpitasya dvayalakṣaṇasyābhāvaḥ |
SA20n1370:195: yathā māyākṛtasyābhāve tasya nimittasya kāṣṭhādikasya vyaktirbhūtārthopalabhyate,
SA20n1370:199: yathā tannimitte kāṣṭhādāvabhrānto lokaḥ kāmataścarati svatantraḥ tathā''śrayaparāvṛttāvaparyasta āryaḥ kāmacāri bhavati svatantraḥ |
SA20n1370:203: na bhāvastatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca |
SA20n1370:205: na bhāvastatra cābhāvo yastadākṛtibhāvo nāsau na bhāvaḥ |
SA20n1370:206: nābhāvo bhāva eva ca yo hastitvādyabhāvo nāsau na[?]bhāvaḥ |
SA20n1370:210: ya eva hastitvādyabhāvaḥ sa eva tadākṛtibhāvaḥ |
SA20n1370:216: na bhāvastatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca |
SA20n1370:223: ya eva hi dvayābhāsatāyā bhāvaḥ sa eva dvayasyābhāva iti |
SA20n1370:232: abhāvasya hyabhāvatvaṃ viditvā samāropaṃ na karoti |
SA20n1370:234: tayoścāviśeṣaṃ viditvā na bhāvādudvijate tasmānna hinayānena niryāti |
SA20n1370:242: dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate ||25 ||
SA20n1370:244: dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate ||26 ||
SA20n1370:252: ye dharmā bhrāntilakṣaṇā vipakṣasvabhāvāste sadasanto māyopamāśca |
SA20n1370:256: tayośca bhāvābhāvayoraviśiṣṭatvāt santo 'pyasanto 'pi māyāpi caivaṃlakṣaṇā sta[ta? ]
SA20n1370:260: ye 'pi prātipakṣikā dharmā buddhenopadiṣṭāḥ smṛtyupasthānādayaste 'pyalakṣaṇā māyāśca nirdiṣṭāḥ |
SA20n1370:268: ye prātipakṣikā dharmāste māyārājasthānīyāḥ saṃkleśaprahāṇe vyavadānādhipattyāt |
SA20n1370:276: ṣaṭ ṣaṭ dvau ca punaśca ṣaṭ dvayamatā ekaikaśaśca trayaḥ
SA20n1370:277: saṃskārāḥ khalu tatra tatra kathitā buddhairvibuddhottamaiḥ ||30 ||
SA20n1370:278: yattūktaṃ bhagavatā māyopamā dharmā yāvannirmāṇopamā iti |
SA20n1370:282: marīcikopamau dvau dharmau cittaṃ caitasikāśca bhrāntikaratvāt |
SA20n1370:290: abhūtakalpo na bhūto nābhūto 'kalpa eva ca |
SA20n1370:291: na kalpo nāpi cākalpaḥ sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ nirucyate ||31 ||
SA20n1370:295: na kalpo nāpi cākalpo lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ jñānam |
SA20n1370:303: sahāvidyayā kleśaiśca vṛttireṣāṃ ta ime sāvidyākleśavṛttayaḥ |
SA20n1370:309: svadhātusthānayogata iti svadhāturvikalpānāṃ tathatā tatra sthānaṃ nāmni sthānāccetasaḥ |
SA20n1370:311: bhāvanāmārgeṇa ta eva vikalpā advayābhāsā vartante parāvṛttāśrayasya |
SA20n1370:313: yathā hi svaratvāpagamāttadeva carma mṛdu bhavati |
SA20n1370:315: evaṃ śamathavipaśyanābhāvanābhyāṃ cetaḥ prajñāvimuktilābhe parāvṛttāśrayasya ta eva vikalpā na punardvayābhāsāḥ pravartante |
SA20n1370:323: na tu tadābhāsādanyaḥ kliṣṭo dharmo 'sti rāgādilakṣaṇaḥ kuśalo vā śraddhādilakṣaṇaḥ |
SA20n1370:337: lakṣyaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ caiva lakṣaṇā ca prabhedataḥ |
SA20n1370:350: tatra parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ yathā jalpārthasaṃjñāyā nimittaṃ tasya jalpasya vāsanā tasmācca vāsanādyo 'rthaḥ khyāti avyavahārakuśalānāṃ vināpi yathājalpārthasaṃjñayā |
SA20n1370:352: tasyā yadālambanaṃ tannimittamevaṃ [va] yacca parikalpyate yataśca kāraṇādvāsana[nā]tastadubhayaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇamatrābhipretam |
SA20n1370:353: yathā nāmārthamarthasya nāmnaḥ prakhyānatā ca yā |
SA20n1370:355: aparaparyāyo yathā nāma cārthaśca yathānāmārthamarthasya nāmnaśca prakhyānatā yathā nāmārthaprakhyānatā |
SA20n1370:356: yadi yathā nāmārthaḥ khyāti yathārthaṃ vā nāma ityetadabhūtaparikalpālambanaṃ parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ etāvaddhi parikalpyate yaduta nāma vā artho veti |
SA20n1370:378: etena trividhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tathatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ kle[saṃ]śavyavadānalakṣaṇamavikalpalakṣaṇaṃ ca uktaṃ trividhaṃ lakṣaṇam |
SA20n1370:383: tatrādhāro niṣpa[ṣya]ndadharmo yo buddhenādhigamo deśitaḥ sa tasyādhigamasya niṣpa[ṣya]ndaḥ |
SA20n1370:385: ādarśaḥ cittasya dhātau sthānaṃ samādhiryadetatpūrvaṃ nāmni sthānamuktam |
SA20n1370:400: na ca tasyonatvaṃ saṃkleśapakṣanirodhe nādhikatvaṃ vyavadānapakṣotpāda ityeṣā pañcavidhā yogabhūmirlakṣaṇā |
SA20n1370:401: tayā hi tallakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca lakṣyate |
SA20n1370:411: caturdhā vaśitā bhavati yathākramamavikalpe kṣetre jñānakarmaṇośca |
SA20n1370:419: tadanyasyāṃ bhūmāvekai[vai]kā vaśitā sādhumatyāṃ jñānavaśitā pratisaṃvidviśeṣalābhāt |
SA20n1370:422: samaṃ tacca jñātvā praviśati sa tattvaṃ grahaṇataḥ |
SA20n1370:423: tatastatra sthānānmanasa iha na khyāti tadapi
SA20n1370:426: dvividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ viditvā bhavatrayagataṃ bodhisattvaḥ samaṃ tacca jñātvā dvividhanairātmyaṃ parikalpitapudgalābhāvāt parikalpitadharmābhāvāt,
SA20n1370:429: tatastatra tattvavijñaptimātrasthānānmanasastadapi tattvaṃ na khyāti vijñaptimātram |
SA20n1370:430: tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya yo vigamaḥ pudgaladharmayoranupalambhāt |
SA20n1370:432: paśyati hi nāmamātraṃ tatpaśyaṃstacca naiva paśyati bhūyaḥ ||48 ||
SA20n1370:433: apara[raḥ]paryāyaḥ ādhāra iti śrutau saṃbhārāditi saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārasya pūrvasaṃbhāralābhāt |
SA20n1370:435: paśyati hi nāmamātramiti vijñaptimātraṃ nāma arūpiṇaścatvāraḥ skandhā iti kṛtvā tatpaśyaṃstadapi bhūyo naiva paśyatyarthābhāve tadvijñaptyadarśanādityayamanupalambho vimuktiḥ |
SA20n1370:441: nivṛttistu tadadhyātmasthiteriti tasya cittasya citta evāvasthānādālambanānupalambhataḥ |
SA20n1370:451: yathā bālānāṃ svabhāvagrāho nityasukhaśucyātto[tmā] vā 'nyena vā parikalpitalakṣaṇena tathāsau svabhāvo nāsti tasmādapi niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ dharmāṇāmiṣyate |..........
SA20n1370:457: yo 'nirūddhaḥ sa ādiśāntaḥ ya ādiśāntaḥ sa prakṛtiparinirvṛta ityevamuttarottaraniśrayairebhirniḥsvabhāvatā[di]bhirniḥsvabhāvatayā 'nutpādādayaḥ siddhā bhavanti |
SA20n1370:474: na hi kṣayajñānalābhinaḥ saṃkleśasyotpattiṃ punaḥ paśyanti |
SA20n1370:488: aniyataśrāvakagotrāṇāṃ mahāyānena niryāṇāt yānti tena yānamiti kṛtvā |
SA20n1370:491: śrāvakāṇāṃ ca tadgotraniyatānāṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisaṃbhāracaritādanā[nāmā]tmani buddhāśayaprāpterabhinnasaṃtānādhimokṣalābhato buddhānubhāvena tathāgatānugrahaviśeṣapradeśalābhāya ityekatvāśayalābhenaikatvād buddhatacchrāvakāṇāmekayānatā |
SA20n1370:493: yathoktamanekaśatakṛtvo 'haṃ śrāvakayānena parinirvṛta iti vineyānāmarthe tathā nirmāṇasaṃdarśanāt |
SA20n1370:494: paryantādapyekayānatā yataḥ pareṇa yātavyaṃ nāsti tadyānamiti kṛtvā |
SA20n1370:496: evaṃ tatra-tatra sūtre tena tanābhiprāyeṇaikayānatā veditavyā,
SA20n1370:508: adṛṣṭārthayānaśca yo na dṛṣṭasatyo mahāyānena niryāti |
SA20n1370:514: tau ca dṛṣṭārthau labdhasyāryamārgasya bhaveṣu pariṇāmanāt acintyapariṇāmikyā upapattyā samanvāgatau veditavyau |
SA20n1370:515: acintyo hi tasyāryamārgasya pariṇāma upapattau tasmādacintyapariṇāmikī |
SA20n1370:518: tayoścaikaḥ praṇidhānavaśādupapattiṃ gṛhṇāti yatheṣṭaṃ yo na vītarāgaḥ |
SA20n1370:522: tau ca nirvāṇābhiratatvādubhāvapi dhandhagatikau matau ciratareṇābhisaṃbodhataḥ |
SA20n1370:526: yaḥ punarasāvavītarāgo dṛṣṭasatyaḥ so 'kṛtārthaḥ śaikṣo bhavan buddharahite kāle jāto dhyānārthamudyato bhavati nirmāṇārthī |
SA20n1370:527: tacca nirmāṇamāśritya krameṇa parāṃ bodhiṃ prāpnoti |
SA20n1370:529: śrāvako bhūtvā pratyekabuddho bhavati punaśca buddha iti |
SA20n1370:530: agnidṛṣṭānte[na] ca yadā ca pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭasatyāvasthā[stho] yadā buddharahite kāle svayaṃ dhyānamutpādya janmakāyaṃ tyaktvā nirmāṇakāyaṃ gṛhṇāti yadā ca parāṃ bodhiṃ prāpnotīti |
SA20n1370:532: vidyāsthāne pañcavidhe yogamakṛtvā sarvajñatvaṃ naiti kathaṃcitparamāryaḥ |
SA20n1370:533: ityanyeṣāṃ nigrahaṇānugrahaṇāya svājñārthaṃ vā tatra karotyeva sa yogam ||60 ||
SA20n1370:535: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca |
SA20n1370:538: bhedena punarhetuvidyāṃ śabdavidyāṃ ca paryeṣate nigrahārthamanyeṣāṃ tadanadhimuktānām |
SA20n1370:542: pāramitāparipūraṇārthaṃ ye pāramitāpratisaṃyuktā evaṃ manasikārā dhātupuṣṭaye bhavanti ta etābhirgāthābhirdeśitāḥ |
SA20n1370:547: gotrastho bodhisattvaḥ svātmani pāramitānāṃ gotraṃ paśyan hetūpalabdhituṣṭyā pāramitādhātupuṣṭiṃ karoti |
SA20n1370:549: sa hi bodhisattvaḥ svātmani pāramitānāṃ saṃniśrayabhūtaṃ bodhicittaṃ samanupaśyannevaṃ manasikaroti niyatametāḥ pāramitāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti |
SA20n1370:552: āsāṃ pāramitānāṃ parasādhāraṇaṃ vā phalaṃ bhavatvanyathā vā mā bhūdityabhisaṃskaraṇāt |
SA20n1370:555: yathā buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ pāramitā abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante 'bhisaṃbudhyante ca tathā 'hamadhimucye ityabhisaṃskaraṇāt |
SA20n1370:570: prasādaḥ saṃpratīkṣā ca dānacchandaḥ paratra ca |
SA20n1370:574: da[de]śanāmārabhya dānacchandamanasikāro dharmasyārthasya ca prakāśanārthaṃ pareṣām |
SA20n1370:578: eta eva trayo manasikārā avavādānuśāsanyāṃ yojayitavyāḥ |
SA20n1370:583: śaktilābhe ca dānādau ṣaḍvidhe dānadāne yāvat prajñādāne |
SA20n1370:593: akṛte kukṛte lajjā kaukṛtyaṃ viṣaye ratiḥ |
SA20n1370:625: yasya pratipakṣeṇa śūnyatā [di]samādhitrayaṃ dharmoddānacatuṣṭayaṃ ca deśyate |
SA20n1370:632: caturvidhamanāścaryamaudarya āyatatve ca sati pāramitānāṃ buddhatvaphalābhinirvartanāt |
SA20n1370:634: tadviśiṣṭebhyaśca śaru[śakrā]dibhyaḥ pūjādilābhe sati pratikāranirapekṣatā .....[sarvalokebhyo viśiṣṭaśarīrabhoga] lābhe satyapi vipākanirapekṣatā |
SA20n1370:640: āśāstimanaskāraḥ sattveṣu tristhānāśaṃsanāt pāramitānāṃ bodhisattvabhūminiṣṭhāyā buddhabhūminiṣṭhāyāḥ sattvāva[rthāca]raṇāśaṃsanācca |
SA20n1370:655: āyatyāṃ darśanādvṛttimanaskāro yātvā[yāṃ yāṃ] gatiṃ gatvā bodhisattvena satā'vaśya karaṇīyatā 'bhisaṃskāraṇāt |
SA20n1370:688: ratnasaṃjñayā durlabhārthena bhaiṣajyasaṃjñayā kleśavyādhipraśamanārthena arthasaṃjñayā avipraṇāśārthena nirvāṇasaṃjñayā sarvaduḥkhapraśamanārthena |
SA20n1370:708: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ rūpameva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpamiti |
SA20n1370:712: rūpasya hi notpādo na nirodho na saṃkleśo na vyavadānamiti |
SA20n1370:716: tāni bodhisattvaḥ sarvanāmāni na samanupaśyatyasamanupaśyannābhiniviśate yathārthatayetyabhiprāyaḥ |
SA20n1370:718: pratiśaraṇamataḥ sadā prajānāṃ bhavati guṇaiḥ sa samudravatprapūrṇaḥ ||78 ||
